topics.body:
Ever saw an airplane take off from its side and notice how unrealistic it ascends? I mean, I noticed it with my bro (who's a pilot) and when I saw an airplane fly upwards, I said to him "That looked so stupid! It flew up like an escalator!".

My bro agreed how stupid it looked.
